allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 3 post-task rating and comprehensive debug mode

Phase 3 Implementation:
- Added post-task rating phase where participants rate all encountered faces
- Two-question format: good/bad binary choice + 6-level confidence rating
- Face presentation order randomized
- Progress bar properly distributed across all three phases \(60%/10%/30%\)
- Collects ~200 trials \(2 per unique face\)

Debug Mode Features:
- Basic debug mode: Skip consent/demographics, reduce trial counts
- Section jumping: Jump directly to any phase \(consent, demographics, phase1, phase2, phase3, end\)
- Simulation mode integration: Visual or data-only automated testing
- URL parameters: ?debug=true&section=X&simulate=visual
- Console logging for transparency

Technical Fixes:
- Fixed button_html to use function syntax \(jsPsych v8 compatibility\)
- Fixed progress bar overflow \(was exceeding 1.0 limit\)
- Proper scope management for trial generation

Files Modified:
- src/experiment.js: Added Phase 3 trials, debug mode, section jumping
- src/utils/helpers.js: Added generatePhase3Trials\(\) function
- src/utils/config.js: Added DEBUG_MODE and DEBUG_SECTIONS config
- README.md: Updated with Phase 3 info and debug mode documentation
- docs/DEV_LOG.md: Added Session 3 entry with comprehensive documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
